text: in terms of workflow, would you use MJML instead of the HubSpot WYSIWYG builder?

I’m a developer, and have “too much” experience in email dev and so I prefer complete control, so yes I would use MJML. The HS WYSIWYG is more geared toward the marketers and will enable them to get 80% of the way to a custom look
MJML will let me get to full custom look
so it's a matter of using MJML to churn out the base code, then adding in the HS-specific code to create modules.
thanks, AJ. gonna have to dig into this. sounds great.
